body:
Need new package for `shadow` project

* package `singularity@3.3.0:` depends on command `newuidmap` (and `newguimap`) for full functionality (fakeroot support).
* `newuidmap` is provided by upstream project https://github.com/shadow-maint/shadow
* building `shadow` in turn appears to require `semange.h`

@vsoch should this package be called `shadow-uidmap` or just `shadow`?

See #12295 for motivation
title: TODO: add new package shadow
